profile_positions.description: Simulation and Experimental Study of Accidental Vacuum Failure Scenarios in the IFMIF-DONES Accelerator using the MuVacAS Facility.
profile_positions.title: PhD Contract

profile_positions.description:
Zeleros designs and develops new technologies for sustainable and efficient transportation, which will allow to travelling at 1000 km/h with renewable energies, combining the best of the aeronautics and the railway industries.

Zeleros has the support of leading companies in several key industries, interested in pushing towards the evolution of this new and promising market and technology. In the short term, the team is applying their knowledge to several fields, but the end objective is to be a leading player in Europe in the development of sustainable transportation technologies, and to build key partnerships to make it a reality. 
Discover more at: www.zeleros.com
profile_positions.title: Mechanical Engineer

profile_positions.description:
Innovation Award 2019 to the TURIAN prototype by SpaceX.

Innovation Award 2019 to the Hyperloop UPV team given by the Fundación Politécnica of the Valencian Community.

During the course, these important events in the team took place:
Test Track: Building of a Hyperloop test track.
Hypertube: Launching of a vacuum chamber of 1.8mm diameter and 12m length.
Turian: Building of a Hyperloop prototype of 450km/h maximum speed.
profile_positions.title: Technical Director

profile_positions.description:
Scolarship: Beca Istobal S.A. 
▪ Mechanical design and manufacture of the power transmission system and the prototype braking system. 
▪ Experimental design for the braking system: 5 mechanical characterization tests, 2 testing tests of the complete braking system. 
▪ Review and approval of plans prior to manufacturing. 
▪ Matlab Expo 2018, exhibitor of the Hyperloop UPV university team.
profile_positions.title: Manufacturing and Structural Analysis

profile_positions.description:
Assistant Professor in the subject of Machine Drawing
Intensity: 4 credits
Activities:
1) Prepare activities and presentations for the sessions.
- Representation of mechanical elements - General principles.
- Dimensioning of mechanical elements - General principles.
- Technical standards applied to mechanical elements.
- Drawing and representation of spur, helical, bevel and worm gears - sprocket, belt drive, chain drive, bolted joints and threaded elements, welded joints, pins, cotters and retaining rings, bearings, bearings and couplings.
- Limits, tolerances and fits. Geometric tolerances. Surface finishes.
- Assembly drawings.
- Process and assembly sheets.
2) Teaching 3 groups of 25 students per semester.
3) Evaluation of manufacturing and assembly drawings according to the ISO (total: 21 machines per semester).
profile_positions.title: ASSISTANT PROFESSOR

profile_positions.description:
Asistente en investigación sobre rehabilitación por medio de la Indoor Rowing Machine, además estudios biomecánicos.
 Proyecto: Computational model of the skeletal muscle adaptation during functional electrical stimulation.
1) Manejo del Laboratorio de Análisis de Movimiento, 
2) Instrumentación de una máquina de remo, usando tarjetas Arduino y DAQ de National Instrument.
3) Planeación, diseño e implementación experimental de pruebas en pacientes sobre una máquina de remo.
4) Análisis de resultados de datos experimentales haciendo uso de Matlab y el software estadístico R.
Desarrollo de modelos biomecánicos del sistema musculo-esquelético en OpenSim.
profile_positions.title: Asistente de investigación

education.field_of_study: Specialty: Pathway in nuclear and particle physics
